page.title: 082CR RADIO STATION
page.content:
We carried out a survey about 2CR in Bournemouth. 42 people work for 2CR as DJ's etc. Before the building was turned into 2CR it was an MFI store for furniture and before that it was an indoor bowling green. They try to follow the same pattern every day: Nine hours of records, Nine minutes of advertisments per hour, Three minutes of news per hour(local and national),Fifteen hours of infomation. They broadcast along the South Coast from Weymouth to Lymington and Northwards towards Salisbury.There is a daily potential listening audience of 597,000 people in the 2CR area. Money from the advertising revenues is Â£1,200,000 a year.
Susan Miller, Diane Watson
